title: Storytelling Through Art
description: Students create visual storytelling projects by illustrating their own short stories.
subject: Art & Language Arts
learning_objectives: Develop creativity and visual storytelling skills.

title: The Science of Color Mixing
description: A hands-on lesson exploring color theory and how primary colors mix to create secondary colors.
subject: Art & Science
learning_objectives: Experiment with color mixing to observe new hues.
Learn how artists use color to create mood and depth.

title: Creating Symmetry in Art
description: Students explore the concept of symmetry by designing their own symmetrical drawings.
subject: Art & Math
learning_objectives: Apply mathematical concepts of symmetry in art.

title: Historical Figures in Art
description: Students research historical figures and create artistic portraits that reflect their contributions.
subject: History & Art
learning_objectives: Connect historical knowledge with artistic representation.
Develop research and creative interpretation skills.
Create meaningful visual tributes to influential figures.

title: Designing a Classroom Mural
description: A collaborative project where students design and plan a mural based on a chosen theme.
subject: Art & Community Engagement
learning_objectives: Work collaboratively on a large-scale art project.
Learn about composition, color harmony, and design planning.
Create art that reflects shared themes and values.
